data.title: EDT Time Now Eastern Daylight Time (North America)
data.meta_description: EDT time now, get the current time in Eastern Daylight Time (North America) with UTC time offset, time difference and current date in time zone.
data.text:
EDT Time Now

EDT is the abbreviation of Eastern Daylight Time (North America). Time zone offset of EDT is UTC-04. Eastern Daylight Time (North America) is 4 hours behind from the UTC universal time. EDT current date is 18th Sunday August 2024. Current time in EDT (EDT).

EDT is the abbreviation of Eastern Daylight Time (North America). This time standard is valid as summer daylight saving time for most of Ontario, Quebec and Nunavut states, as well as for a number of states in the US, including Connecticut, Georgia, Maryland, New York, Massachusetts, Ohio, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, West Virginia, Vermont, and some smaller states of the region. Some of the states use this time standard as a basic of two time standards. EDT is also effective for Mexican state of Quintana Roo. Eastern Daylight Time (North America) is 4 hours behind the UTC universal time.

What time is it in Eastern Daylight Time (North America) now? It is 05:58:52 right now.
